item.sql: INSERT INTO DOR_DOOR_CARD_DTLS (dcd_cus_number, dcd_door_card_id, dcd_surface_id, dcd_chip_id, dcd_people_id, dcd_people_type, dcd_use, dcd_seq, dcd_crte_time, dcd_crte_user_id) VALUES (:dcd_cus_number, :dcd_door_card_id, :dcd_surface_id, :dcd_chip_id, :dcd_people_id, :dcd_people_type, :dcd_use, :dcd_door_card_id, SYSDATE, :dcd_crte_user_id)

SELECT dcd_cus_number, dcd_door_card_id, dcd_surface_id, dcd_chip_id, dcd_people_id, person_name, dcd_people_type, dcd_people_type_ch, dcd_use, dcd_use_ch, dcd_seq, dcd_crte_time, dcd_crte_user_id FROM (SELECT dcd_cus_number, dcd_door_card_id, dcd_surface_id, dcd_chip_id, dcd_people_id, pbd_police_name AS person_name, dcd_people_type, dcd_people_type AS dcd_people_type_ch, dcd_use, dcd_use AS dcd_use_ch, dcd_seq, dcd_crte_time, dcd_crte_user_id FROM DOR_DOOR_CARD_DTLS INNER JOIN PLC_POLICE_BASE_DTLS ON dcd_cus_number = pbd_cus_number AND dcd_people_type = 1 AND dcd_people_id = pbd_user_id Union ALL SELECT dcd_cus_number, dcd_door_card_id, dcd_surface_id, dcd_chip_id, dcd_people_id, pbd_prsnr_name AS person_name, dcd_people_type, dcd_people_type AS dcd_people_type_ch, dcd_use, dcd_use AS dcd_use_ch, dcd_seq, dcd_crte_time, dcd_crte_user_id FROM DOR_DOOR_CARD_DTLS INNER JOIN PSR_PRISONER_BASE_DTLS ON dcd_cus_number = pbd_cus_number AND dcd_people_type = 2 AND dcd_people_id = pbd_prsnr_id)

UPDATE DOR_DOOR_CARD_DTLS SET dcd_surface_id = :dcd_surface_id , dcd_people_id = :dcd_people_id, dcd_chip_id = :dcd_chip_id, dcd_people_type = :dcd_people_type, dcd_use = :dcd_use WHERE dcd_door_card_id = :dcd_door_card_id
